Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
KeyboardTool  
SessionListener Any class that uses some session should implement this interface.
ShutdownInterface Any class implementing this can have a handled shutdown
Tool Create a generic interface for tools.
TwoPointShapeFactory An interface defining a class for creating TwoPointShape objects.
 

Class Summary
AdvOval The AdvOval class implements methods necessary to manipulate AdvOval, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.
AdvRectangle The AdvRectangle class implements methods necessary to manipulate AdvRectangle, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.
ChatPanelController Implments a chatPanel controller.
ChatPanelView Manages viewable state of control panel.
CompilingClassLoader A CompilingClassLoader compiles your Java source on-the-fly.
Constants This class defines some constants in a single place.
ControlPanelController This class manages the controlPanel.
ControlPanelView Manages viewable state of control panel.
DrawingCanvas DrawingCanvas is the actual drawing surface.
DrawState Manages the DrawState for a Session.
DynamicTwoPointShapeFactory Implements the TwoPointShapeFactory, to create Rectangle objects.
EraserTool Implements an erasing tool, which will delete objects drawn on the canvas.
FreeHandFactory A class for creating FreeHandObject shapes.
FreeHandObject Implements a freehand drawing segment, which really consists of a bunch of lines.
FreehandTool Tool for manipulating FreeHandObjects
InitialWindowController This class manages the Initial Window Controller.
InitialWindowView Handles being the first window in view.
KeyboardController KeyboardController provides a class to accept Key events, and hand them to the current session.
Line The line class implements methods necessary to manipulate lines, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.
LineFactory Implements the TwoPointShapeFactory, to create Line objects.
Member Member class for a network session.
MenuBarController This class handles the control over all menu items except the predefined tool list from ObjectDraw.
MenuBarView Implements a MenuBar.
MouseController Controller of the DrawingCanvas.
MultiDraw  
NetworkBundle Macro class, puts some things together for convenient management.
NetworkObject A network object, this is the only item sent over the network.
Output A macro for message processing, allows layers to turn on/off some messages depending on setting.
Oval The Oval class implements methods necessary to manipulate Ovals, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.
OvalFactory Implements the TwoPointShapeFactory, to create Oval objects.
PeerThread A peer thread.
Rectangle The Rectangle class implements methods necessary to manipulate Rectangles, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.
RectangleFactory Implements the TwoPointShapeFactory, to create Rectangle objects.
SelectorTool Implements a selector tool for selecting, and manipulating objects.
Session Implements a network session.
SessionManager Manages all the sessions that this program participates in.
SessionUtils Static utilities.
Shape Abstract interface for all Shapes that may be manipulated by MultiDraw.
ShapeMath Does some common math functions for shapes.
ShutdownHandler Handles shutting down any number of items that have the shutdown interface.
Text This class implements a Text object, drawing text where it is asked.
TextFactory Implements a textFactory for creating text objects.
TextTool TextTool is an instance of KeyboardTool, capable of creating text objects.
ToolBarView A Tool bar implementation.
ToolController ToolController, to handle toolEvents.
TwoPointShape Creates an abstract class for shapes that are defined by two points.
TwoPointShapeTool Generic tool that manipulates objects that have two points.
